titleStmt.title: A practical commentary upon the first epistle general of St. Peter. Vol. II containing the third, fourth and fifth chapters / by the most Reverend Robert Leighton ... ; published after his death at the request of his friends.
titleStmt.author: Leighton, Robert, 1611-1684.
Fall, James, 1646 or 7-1711.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by B.G. for Sam. Keble ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
